subject: Task Completed
content: Quick Switcher (Ctrl+K) implementation completed successfully. All features implemented and integrated: fuzzy search, keyboard navigation, recent destinations, global hotkey, and modal integration. Files created: apps/web/components/modals/quick-switcher-modal.tsx, apps/web/hooks/use-quick-switcher.ts. Files modified: hooks/use-modal-store.ts, components/providers/modal-provider.tsx. Ready for testing and use.
